meanings.definition: A person who entertains guests at a resort or similar establishment.
meanings.sent1: The tummler at the hotel made everyone laugh with his jokes.
meanings.sent2: The resort's tummler organized fun activities for the guests.
meanings.sent3: The tummler's funny dance moves entertained the crowd.
meanings.sent4: She was the tummler of the party, bringing joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The tummler's cheerful personality brightened the atmosphere.

meanings.definition: To act as a host or entertainer at a social gathering.
meanings.sent1: He decided to tummler at the family reunion, making sure everyone felt welcome.
meanings.sent2: She loves to tummler at events, ensuring everyone has a good time.
meanings.sent3: The friends asked him to tummler at the picnic because of his outgoing nature.
meanings.sent4: She will tummler at the party, ensuring everyone is entertained.
meanings.sent5: They chose him to tummler at the gathering due to his friendly demeanor.
